items.title: Burnley 2-2 Manchester United: Premier League ‚Äì live
items.summary: ‚öΩ Premier League updates from the 8.15pm GMT kick-off ‚öΩ Fulham v Chelsea, Bournemouth v Spurs, and more ‚Äì live ‚öΩ Live scores | Table | Follow us on Bluesky | Email Daniel They‚Äôre about to discuss Mainoo on Sky, so here‚Äôs my take. He‚Äôs got incredible ability in tight spaces, but needs to get better and finding the ball ‚Äì too much of too many games passed him by ‚Äì stronger, faster, and better at passing it forward. That said, United‚Äôs dreadfulness made his continuing omission completely unjustifiable, and I‚Äôm sure he‚Äôll now get a chance in the three-man midfield he needs to thrive. If, in a year, he‚Äôs got a young, physical six behind him, the best creator in world football ahead of him, and he‚Äôs still not making it happen, we can wonder if, perhaps, he‚Äôs not quite good enough, despite his strengths. But not until then. There are plenty of other matches tonight, just underway. Niall McVeigh has you covered. Continue reading...

items.title: Finnbogason wordt technisch directeur: 'Op Nederland ge√Ønspireerde speelstijl'
items.summary: Alfred Finnbogason (36) is de nieuwe technisch directeur van Rosenborg BK. Dat maakte de Noorse club woensdag bekend.

items.title: Defensively, we are more stable than ever - Guardiola
items.summary: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola is pleased with his side's defensive performance highlighting Max Alleyne as "exceptional" in their 1-1 draw at home to Brighton.

items.title: Rosenior unready to coach Chelsea loss at Fulham
items.summary: Liam Rosenior chose not to take charge of Chelsea for the first time in Wednesday's Premier League clash against Fulham because of the "difficult time-frame" between his appointment on Tuesday and the game at Craven Cottage.

items.title: Roma chief: Amorim axe has changed Zirkzee plan
items.summary: Roma sporting director Ricky Massara has hinted that a planned move for Joshua Zirkzee may be on the backburner following Ruben Amorim's Manchester United sacking.

items.title: Man City drop more points in draw with Brighton
items.summary: Title-chasing Manchester City dropped points for a third successive game as they were held to a 1-1 draw by Brighton on Wednesday.

items.title: Raphinha double leads Barcelona Super Cup romp
items.summary: Raphinha scored a brace as Barcelona eased into the Spanish Super Cup final with a thumping 5-0 victory over Athletic Club in Saudi Arabia.

items.title: Brighton never gave up - Hurzeler
items.summary: Fabian Hurzeler wants Brighton to cut out their individual errors, but is pleased they were able to fight back and claim a draw against Manchester City.

items.title: Semenyo goes out in style with dramatic 95th minute winner!
items.summary: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from Bournemouth's win against Tottenham in the Premier League.

items.title: VI Live: spektakelstuk op St James' Park als toetje op woensdagavond
items.summary: Woensdagavond staan er weer veel mooie potjes op het programma. Er zijn liefst acht duels in de Premier League, er wordt gevoetbald in de Serie A en Barcelona speelt de halve finale van de Spaanse Supercopa tegen Athletic Bilbao. Volg de duels in de VI Live.

items.title: Semenyo neemt in stijl afscheid bij Bournemouth, Man City morst weer dure punten
items.summary: INTRO

items.title: Fulham‚Äôs Harry Wilson piles pain on 10-man Chelsea as Liam Rosenior watches on
items.summary: It was a crash course in the modern Chelsea for Liam Rosenior. The new head coach saw rash decisions undermine flashes of promise and heard rumblings of discontent. Few supporters are convinced by the club‚Äôs direction and the cracks were evident when the travelling supporters aimed mutinous chants at the Chelsea hierarchy as they watched their erratic side fall to a chaotic 2-1 defeat at Fulham. Steering this project back on course will not be easy for Rosenior. Perhaps he will reflect that he has already made his first misstep since leaving Strasbourg. He elected not to sit in the away dugout, leaving Calum McFarlane in interim charge after the draw with Manchester City, and the result was Chelsea producing a directionless performance in which they lost Marc Cucurella to an early red card before losing to a late goal from Harry Wilson. Continue reading...

items.title: Inter verstevigt koppositie, Ekkelenkamp goud waard voor Udinese
items.summary: Internazionale heeft de voorsprong op AC Milan vergroot naar vier punten. Dat moest gebeuren tegen Parma, de oude club van trainer Cristian Chivu: 0-1.

items.title: Antoine Semenyo‚Äôs parting gift gives Bournemouth victory over shaky Spurs
items.summary: For 95 minutes, Antoine Semenyo had done nothing other than receive a yellow card for his 26th birthday. Then came the farewell moment he had dreamed of. Delivered the ball on the edge of the Tottenham penalty area, he struck the sweetest of shots past a helpless Guglielmo Vicario to end Bournemouth‚Äôs longest barren run of their Premier League era and sign off in the most perfect fashion. With a move to Manchester City imminent, he can depart the south coast with the blessing of everyone at the club where he has developed into one of English football‚Äôs most dangerous players. After 11 winless games, Bournemouth again know what it feels like to win. Continue reading...

items.title: Brighton‚Äôs Kaoru Mitoma punishes Manchester City as title bid falters again
items.summary: Pep Guardiola believes team spirit will help Manchester City get through a difficult period but more than camaraderie alone will be required on this evidence. City endured a third consecutive draw against Brighton to leave the leaders, Arsenal, who have a game in hand, five points ahead and currently without a title challenger. City were left with 14 fit senior outfield players for the match and those on the pitch looked fatigued. An Erling Haaland penalty gave a platform they were unable to build on as City let Brighton come back into the match and deservedly depart with a point thanks to Kaoru Mitoma. Continue reading...

items.title: Written in the stars! Semenyo wins it for Bournemouth vs Spurs with last kick
items.summary: Antoine Semenyo gave Bournemouth the perfect goodbye gift as his 95th minute winner - likely his last kick for the club - earned his team a 3-2 win over Spurs, to ramp up the pressure on Thomas Frank.

items.title: Wasteful Man City held to Brighton draw as title hopes take another hit
items.summary: Wasteful Manchester City dropped points for the third game in a row after being held to a 1-1 draw with battling Brighton.

items.title: Ontketende Brentford-spits zet Braziliaans Premier League-record neer
items.summary: Igor Thiago heeft woensdagavond geschiedenis geschreven in de Premier League. De spits van Brentford scoorde twee keer tegen Sunderland en kwam daarmee op zestien competitietreffers dit seizoen. Daarmee is hij de Braziliaan met de meeste doelpunten in √©√©n Premier League-jaargang ooit.

items.title: Premier League live updates: ≈†e≈°ko strikes twice for Man United in Fletcher's first game
items.summary: With new boss Liam Rosenior watching, Chelsea were unable to beat Fulham. Plus, interim boss Darren Fletcher leads Man United vs. Burnley.
